mapper.select: SELECT c.CAR_NO FROM t_ev_card c WHERE c.CARD_NO=#{cardNo}
SELECT s.COMPANY_ID FROM tb_base_station s WHERE s.CODE_=#{stationCode}
SELECT s.NAME_ FROM tb_base_station s WHERE s.CODE_=#{stationCode}
SELECT d.NAME_ devName FROM tb_base_dev d WHERE d.CODE_=#{devCode} and d.STATION_CODE=#{stationCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_ev_order o SET o.CHARGE_END=#{chargeEnd}, o.ELECTRIC_CHARGE=#{electricCharge}, o.ELECTRIC_CHARGE_J=#{electricChargeJ}, o.ELECTRIC_CHARGE_F=#{electricChargeF}, o.ELECTRIC_CHARGE_P=#{electricChargeP}, o.ELECTRIC_CHARGE_G=#{electricChargeG}, o.EXPENSE=#{expense}, o.EXPENSE_J=#{expenseJ}, o.EXPENSE_F=#{expenseF}, o.EXPENSE_P=#{expenseP}, o.EXPENSE_G=#{expenseG}, o.MONETARY=#{monetary}, o.BALANCE_=#{balance}, o.STATUS_='3' WHERE o.CARD_NO=#{cardNo} AND o.STATION_CODE=#{stationCode} AND o.DEV_CODE=#{devCode} AND (o.CHARGE_END is null or o.CHARGE_END='') AND o.PORT_=#{port}
mapper.select: SELECT o.CARD_NO, o.CHARGE_BEGIN, o.CHARGE_END, o.STATION_CODE, o.DEV_CODE, o.PORT_, o.STATUS_ FROM t_ev_order o WHERE o.CARD_NO=#{cardNo} AND o.CHARGE_BEGIN=#{chargeBegin} AND o.STATION_CODE=#{stationCode} AND o.DEV_CODE=#{devCode} AND o.PORT_=#{port}

SELECT o.CAR_NO, o.EXPENSE, o.ELECTRIC_CHARGE, o.CARD_NO, o.STATION_NAME, o.DEV_NAME, o.CHARGE_BEGIN, o.CHARGE_END, o.BALANCE_, o.COMPANY_ID, o.STATUS_, o.STATION_CODE, o.DEV_CODE, o.PORT_ FROM t_ev_order o
and o.STATUS_='2'
and (o.CARD_NO LIKE '%${cardNo}%' or o.CAR_NO LIKE '%${cardNo}%')
and o.COMPANY_ID=#{companyId}
order by o.CHARGE_BEGIN
mapper.update: UPDATE t_ev_order o SET o.STATUS_='3' WHERE o.CARD_NO =#{cardNo} AND o.STATION_CODE!=#{stationCode} AND o.DEV_CODE!=#{devCode} AND o.PORT_!=#{port} AND o.STATUS_='2'
UPDATE t_ev_order o SET o.STATUS_='3' WHERE o.CARD_NO!=#{cardNo} AND o.STATION_CODE=#{stationCode} AND o.DEV_CODE=#{devCode} AND o.PORT_=#{port} AND o.STATUS_='2'
mapper.select:
SELECT o.CAR_NO, o.CARD_NO, o.CHARGE_BEGIN, o.CHARGE_END, o.STATION_NAME, o.DEV_NAME, o.ELECTRIC_CHARGE, o.EXPENSE FROM t_ev_order o
and o.STATUS_='3' and o.COMPANY_ID=#{companyId}
and DATE_FORMAT(o.CHARGE_BEGIN,'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') >=DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y%m%d%H%i%s')
and DATE_FORMAT(o.CHARGE_END,'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') <=DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y%m%d%H%i%s')
and o.STATION_NAME=#{stationName}
and (o.CARD_NO LIKE '%${cardNo}%' or o.CAR_NO LIKE '%${cardNo}%')
order by o.CHARGE_BEGIN
mapper.update: UPDATE t_ev_order o SET o.CAR_NO=#{carNo} WHERE o.CARD_NO=#{cardNo} AND (o.CAR_NO is null or o.CAR_NO='')
mapper.select:
SELECT o.CARD_NO, o.CAR_NO, o.CHARGE_BEGIN, ROUND(SUM(IFNULL(o.ELECTRIC_CHARGE_J,0.00)),2) charge_J, ROUND(SUM(IFNULL(o.ELECTRIC_CHARGE_F,0.00)),2) charge_F, ROUND(SUM(IFNULL(o.ELECTRIC_CHARGE_P,0.00)),2) charge_P, ROUND(SUM(IFNULL(o.ELECTRIC_CHARGE_G,0.00)),2) charge_G, DATE_FORMAT(o.CHARGE_BEGIN,'%Y-%m-%d') days FROM t_ev_order o
AND o.STATUS_='3' AND o.COMPANY_ID=#{companyId} AND o.CARD_NO=#{cardNo}
AND DATE_FORMAT(#{dateTime},'%Y%m%')=DATE_FORMAT(o.CHARGE_BEGIN,'%Y%m%')
GROUP BY o.CARD_NO,days

SELECT o.STATION_NAME, ROUND(SUM(IFNULL(o.ELECTRIC_CHARGE_J,0.00)),2) charge_J, ROUND(SUM(IFNULL(o.ELECTRIC_CHARGE_F,0.00)),2) charge_F, ROUND(SUM(IFNULL(o.ELECTRIC_CHARGE_P,0.00)),2) charge_P, ROUND(SUM(IFNULL(o.ELECTRIC_CHARGE_G,0.00)),2) charge_G, o.CHARGE_BEGIN, DATE_FORMAT(o.CHARGE_BEGIN,'%Y-%m-%d') days FROM t_ev_order o
AND o.STATUS_='3' AND o.COMPANY_ID=#{companyId} AND o.STATION_NAME=#{stationName}
AND DATE_FORMAT(#{dateTime},'%Y%m%')=DATE_FORMAT(o.CHARGE_BEGIN,'%Y%m%')
GROUP BY o.STATION_NAME,days
